doctor.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill
doctor.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She was treated by her local doctor.
I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
‘Where’s Sandy today?’ ‘I think she’s at the doctor’s.’
doctor.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who holds the highest level of degree given by a university
doctor.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: I’d been having bad headaches so I went to the doctor.
Have you seen a doctor about it yet?
If you have any of these symptoms, you should consult a doctor.
His mother was very worried and called the doctor.
In the middle of the night we decided to get the doctor.
The doctor examined her and said she had a chest infection.
My doctor prescribed a course of antibiotics.
We’ve had the same family doctor for fifteen years.
You should go and see your local doctor.
Junior hospital doctors have to work very long hours.
doctor.translation[0].note_box[1].sectio: doctor
someone who treats people who are ill, who has completed a long course of study at medical school
If you have bad chest pains, you should see a doctor.
GP
a doctor who is trained in general medicine and who treats the people who live in a local area
My GP told me that I must lose weight.
physician
a doctor
the American physician, Dr James Tyler Kent
quack
someone who pretends to be a doctor
My father felt that people practicing alternative medicine were just a bunch of quacks.
the medical profession
doctors and nurses considered as a group
This view is widely accepted among the medical profession.
surgeon
a doctor who does operations in a hospital
One of the world’s top heart surgeons performed the operation.
specialist
a doctor with special knowledge about a particular illness, part of the body, or type of treatment
The new drug is being tested by cancer specialists.
an eye specialist
consultant
a very senior doctor in a hospital, with a lot of knowledge about a particular area of medicine
The consultant said that he did not think it was cancer.
paramedic
someone who has been trained to treat sick or injured people, especially at the scene of an accident
Paramedics treated him for shock.
vet
a doctor who treats animals
We took the cat to the vet.
paediatrician
a doctor who treats children who are sick
gynaecologist
a doctor who treats medical conditions and illnesses that affect women’s bodies
obstetrician
a doctor who deals with the birth of children
radiographer
someone whose job is to take X-rays or to treat people using an X-ray machine
a doctor who treats mental illness
psychiatrist
a doctor who is trained to treat people with mental illnesses
In order to become a psychiatrist, you first need a medical degree.
psychologist
a scientist who studies and is trained in psychology (=the study of the mind)
Many psychologists believe that aggression is a learned behaviour.
shrink
a humorous word for a psychiatrist
therapist
a trained person whose job is to help people with their emotional problems, especially by talking to them and asking them to talk about their feelings
someone who is studying to be a doctor
medical student
a student who is studying medicine in order to be a doctor
James is a medical student at Edinburgh university.
intern
a student who has almost finished studying to be a doctor, and who is working in a hospital
doctor.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to dishonestly change something in order to gain an advantage
doctor.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He had doctored his passport to pass her off as his daughter.
There are concerns that some players have been doctoring the ball.
doctor.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to add something harmful to food or drink
doctor.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Paul suspected that his drink had been doctored.
doctor.translation[1].definitions[2].def: to remove part of the sex organs of an animal to prevent it from having babies
doctor.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: You should have your cat doctored.
doctor.translation[1].definitions[3].def: to give someone medical treatment, especially when you are not a doctor
doctor.translation[1].definitions[3].exa: Bill doctored the horses with a strong-smelling ointment.
doctor.translation[2].definitions[0].def: someone who is trained to treat sick or injured people
doctor.translation[2].definitions[1].def: someone who has a DOCTORATE from a university
doctor.translation[3].definitions[0].def: to change something, especially in order to deceive people
doctor.translation[3].definitions[0].exa: Police uncovered 43 cars for sale with doctored mileage readings.
